member.name: M:Fractions.Fraction.CompareTo(Fractions.Fraction)
member.returns: Returns 0 if equal, 1 if greater and -1 if less.

member.name: M:Fractions.Fraction.Reduce(Fractions.Fraction)
member.returns: A reduced copy of the fraction.

member.name: M:Fractions.MathUtil.GreatestCommonDivisor(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the greatest common divisor of two numbers.

member.name: M:Fractions.MathUtil.LeastCommonMultiple(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Finds the least Common Multiple between two numbers. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Least_common_multiple#Reduction_by_the_greatest_common_divisor
member.returns: Least common multiple of u and v.
